scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.verify:conflicts: rg -n "^(<<<<<<<|=======|>>>>>>>)" client server || echo 'No merge markers found'
scripts.verify: npm run verify:json && npm run verify:conflicts && npm run build --prefix client
